intro: Lastrea harveyi, commonly known as the Harvey's lastrea, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant features fleshy, thick leaves that store water, allowing it to thrive in arid conditions. Its flowers are typically small and yellow, appearing in clusters during the warmer months. It is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and low maintenance requirements.
